# `SignInParams`

```ts
type SignInParams =
  | SignInEmailPasswordParams
  | SignInEmailPasswordOtpParams
  | SignInPasswordlessEmailParams
  | SignInPasswordlessSecurityKeyParams
  | SignInPasswordlessSmsOtpParams
  | SignInPasswordlessSmsParams
  | SignInWithProviderParams
```
